summary: S6 Verification for Accounting (Light) Suite Demo Page - All tests passed. Page loads correctly at /accounting-demo with all 4 tabs functional (COA, Journals, Ledger, Reports). Nigeria-first accounting features verified including 7.5% VAT and double-entry bookkeeping.
test_credentials: Demo page is public - no auth required
seed_data_creation: Demo page uses static hardcoded demo data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Accounting (Light) Suite Demo Page S6 Verification complete. All features working: Chart of Accounts with Nigeria SME template (collapsible hierarchy), Journal Entries (expandable cards with POSTED/DRAFT status), Ledger Balances (Cash, Bank, Mobile Money, POS), Reports (Trial Balance with 'Books are balanced' indicator, VAT Summary with 7.5% Nigerian VAT). Demo uses STATIC data - no live API calls.

features_verified.header: ✓ 'Accounting Demo' title with 'Double-entry bookkeeping • Nigeria SME Chart of Accounts • 7.5% VAT' subtitle

tabs.chart_of_accounts: ✓ Nigeria SME COA with collapsible hierarchy (56 accounts)
tabs.journal_entries: ✓ 5 journal cards with expandable lines, POSTED/DRAFT status
tabs.ledger_balances: ✓ Cash on Hand, Cash in Bank (GTBank), Mobile Money (OPay), POS Terminal Float
tabs.reports: ✓ Trial Balance (₦13,875,000 balanced) and VAT Summary (7.5%)

features_verified.trial_balance: ✓ 'Books are balanced' indicator shown with green checkmark
features_verified.vat_summary: ✓ 7.5% Nigerian VAT with Output VAT ₦525,000, Input VAT ₦75,000, Net VAT Payable ₦450,000
features_verified.info_banner: ✓ Nigeria-First Accounting info with double-entry, COA, VAT, cash-heavy, event-sourced, audit-friendly details

mocked_api_note: MOCKED - Demo page uses hardcoded static demo data for display, no live API calls
